channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Edge
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Edge

item.title: CVE-2020-4941|2024-09-17T00:11:26.318Z -- ibm -- edge
item.description: IBM Edge 4.2 could reveal sensitive version information about the server from error pages that could aid an attacker in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 191941.

item.title: CVE-2020-4792|2024-09-17T03:38:27.780Z -- ibm -- edge
item.description: IBM Edge 4.2 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 189441.

item.title: CVE-2020-4805|2024-09-17T03:07:41.582Z -- ibm -- edge
item.description: IBM Edge 4.2 allows web pages to be stored locally which can be read by another user on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 189539.
